channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How Microschools Became the Latest Tech Mogul Obsession

item.description: From calculators to ChatGPT, the introduction of new technology into schools has long inspired frenzied discourse: Will it revolutionize the system or...

item.title: Grammarly gets a design overhaul, multiple AI features
item.description: Grammarly now has a new document-based interface, built on the back of Coda, the productivity startup it acquired last year. The interface also sports...

item.title: HR giant Workday says hackers stole personal data in recent breach
item.description: The HR tech giant said it had no indication of any unauthorized access to customer systems, but has not ruled out a breach affecting customers' person...

item.title: Linktree goes dark in India — and the company isn’t sure why
item.description: Linktree is "investigating" an issue that has made its link-in-bio platform inaccessible in India for several days.

item.title: The Tweens Down Under: Life Without Social Media in Australia

item.title: WIRED Tests Dozens of Air Purifiers a Year. Here’s What We Look For (2025)
item.description: WIRED’s air quality expert breaks down what we—and you—should consider when assessing one of these popular appliances.

item.title: Why Paradigm built a spreadsheet with an AI agent in every cell
item.description: Paradigm raised a $5 million seed round and is releasing it's AI-powered spreadsheet to the general public.

item.title: 9 Picks of the Best Gaming Mouse, Tested and Reviewed (2025)
item.description: From wired to wireless to ultralight, we've tested dozens of gaming mice to find the best for work, your next MMO, and everything in between.
